trans-unit.source: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a scalar property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性 (Attribute)，表示此屬性 (Property) 代表純量屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true` because key members cannot be `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A>屬性不得同時為`true`因為索引鍵成員不可以是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute> links a scalar property on a data class to a property of an entity type or complex type that is defined in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute> 會將資料類別的純量屬性連結到概念模型中所定義之實體類型或複雜類型的屬性

trans-unit.source: This attribute is applied to properties that return scalar types.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性 (Attribute) 會套用至傳回純量型別 (Scalar Type) 的屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the property is part of the entity key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示此屬性是否為實體索引鍵之一部分的值。

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates whether the property is part of the entity key.
trans-unit.target: 表示此屬性是否為實體索引鍵之一部分的值。

trans-unit.source: Because an entity key can contain more than one property, the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> can be set to true for more than one property of an entity type.
trans-unit.target: 由於實體索引鍵可以包含多個屬性，所以 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> 可以對多個實體類型的屬性設定成 true。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true` because key members cannot be `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A>屬性不得同時為`true`因為索引鍵成員不可以是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the property can have a <see langword="null" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示此屬性是否可以具有 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The value that indicates whether the property can have a <see langword="null" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 值，這個值表示此屬性是否可以具有 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.IsNullable%2A> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmScalarPropertyAttribute.EntityKeyProperty%2A> properties cannot both be `true`.
